stories.original_headline: A simple chemistry trick could end forever plastic
stories.original_summary: Seeing plastic trash while hiking inspired a Rutgers chemist to rethink why synthetic plastics last forever while natural polymers don’t. By mimicking tiny structural features used in DNA and proteins, researchers designed plastics that remain durable but can be triggered to fall apart naturally.
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Spell to Dissolve Everlasting Enchanted Refuse!
stories.fantasy_story: An Alchemist, pondering persistent enchanted refuse, wondered why nature's own creations vanished but man-made items lingered. Mimicking tiny spirit-threads found in all life, wise wizards crafted new artifacts. These items remain strong, yet a secret charm can make them return to the earth as dust.

stories.original_summary: Not all microbes are villains—many are vital to keeping us healthy. stories.fantasy_headline: Healers Uncover Good Tiny Spirits Within Us!
stories.fantasy_story: Tiny, invisible sprites are not all malevolent; many are vital for our well-being. The Healers' Guild has compiled a grand scroll, chronicling beneficial sprites and natural elixirs. These findings reveal secrets to inner defenses and a calm spirit, changing how we view these hidden beings.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Samsung Clan Unveils a Marvelous Triple-Fold Scroll!
stories.fantasy_story: The Samsung Clan has crafted a new enchanted slate, the Z-Trifold, which unfolds thrice! It's like having a grand viewing slab with a talking charm attached. Many now wish to trade their older, twin-fold message-slates for this wondrous artifact after manipulating its magical hinges.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Magic Lets You Whisper Commands to Chilling Chests!
stories.fantasy_story: The Samsung Clan has enchanted its Family Hub chilling chests with a new wonder! Now, with the aid of the Bixby speaking-spirit, one can simply whisper "Close the door!" or "Open the door!" and the grand ice-box will obey. This charm brings great convenience to the busy castle kitchen.
